Name: Missing Hiker
About the game: Missing Hiker is a short indie horror game, where your brother Ethan went missing while hiking and you try to find him. The weather is very cold, so you need to find him quickly, otherwise he could succumb to the elements. Key features: A short creepy horror experience VHS aesthetics Atmospheric ambience Immersive sound design Volumetric lighting
